sentence.Network_en: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentence.Network_en: His immediate superior has singled him out for a special mention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的顶头上司特别提到了他。

sentence.Network_en: Adolescent suicide is rarely an impulsive reaction to immediate distress.
sentence.Network_cn: 青少年自杀很少是由于突然发生不幸而作出的冲动反应。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'nearest in space or order'): from Old French immediat, or from late Latin immediatus, from in- 'not' + mediatus 'intervening', past participle of mediare (see mediate)

entry.def: An immediate result, action, or reaction happens or is done without any delay.

example.ex: These tragic incidents have had an immediate effect...
example.tran: 这些悲剧性事件造成的后果即刻显现。

example.ex: My immediate reaction was just disgust.
example.tran: 我当时的第一反应就是反感。

entry.def: Immediate needs and concerns exist at the present time and must be dealt with quickly.

example.ex: Relief agencies say the immediate problem is not a lack of food, but transportation.
example.tran: 救援机构称最紧迫的问题不是食物匮乏,而是运输不畅。

entry.def: The immediate person or thing comes just before or just after another person or thing in a sequence.

example.ex: In the immediate aftermath of the riots, a mood of hope and reconciliation sprang up...
example.tran: 暴乱过后紧接着出现了期待未来与盼望和解的气氛。

example.ex: His immediate superior, General Geichenko, had singled him out for special mention.
example.tran: 他的直接上级盖琴科将军特别提到了他。

entry.def: You use immediate to describe an area or position that is next to or very near a particular place or person.

example.ex: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity...
example.tran: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

example.ex: I was seated at Sauter's immediate left.
example.tran: 我紧挨着索特左手边坐着。

entry.def: Your immediate family are the members of your family who are most closely related to you, for example your parents, children, brothers, and sisters.

example.ex: The presence of his immediate family is obviously having a calming effect on him.
example.tran: 他的直系亲属都在场,这显然起到了让他镇定的作用。

means.word_mean: 1. very close or connected in space or time;
3. immediately before or after as in a chain of cause and effect;
4. of the present time and place;
5. performed with little or no delay;

auth_sentence.content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.

auth_sentence.content: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their Gallops EP left an immediate, hook-laden impression.

auth_sentence.content: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The seriousness of this incident meant an immediate investigation.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立即的,即时的;直接的,最接近的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im无+medi中间+ate……的→无中间的→立刻的
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
medi中间+ocre石山→中间的山→不是高山→平庸
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+ion表名词→n.调解
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+or人→n.调停者,仲裁人
medi中间+ate表动词→在[中间]走→调停,调解

Sentence.sentence: To get alcohol out of drivers' immediate sight.
If your complaint doesn't require an immediate response, it often helps to complain by letter.
The fight for racial and economic equality is intensely pragmatic (讲求实用的) and immediate in its impact.
It may not bring about immediate economic gains
This will help improve produce handling in the harvest, and immediate post-harvest stages of food production.

means.word_mean: 立即的, 即刻的; 紧迫的

sentences.en: About the problem, we must take immediate actions.
sentences.cn: 关于那个问题, 我们应该立即采取行动。

sentences.en: This matter is immediate, we must do it now.
sentences.cn: 这事刻不容缓, 我们必须现在做。

sentences.en: Put long interests before immediate interests.
sentences.cn: 把长远利益放在眼前利益之上。

sentences.en: Heart failure was the immediate cause of his death.
sentences.cn: 心脏衰竭是他死亡的直接原因。

sentences.en: His immediate neighbours felt it their duty to call.
sentences.cn: 他的近邻认为他们有责任去拜访。

jushi.english: The commander ordered an immediate withdrawal of the troops.
jushi.chinese: 指挥员命令部队立即撤退。

jushi.english: The woman was their immediate superior.
jushi.chinese: 那个女的是他们的顶头上司。

jushi.english: Our Government administered immediate relief to people who had suffered from the earthquake.
jushi.chinese: 政府给遭受地震的群众及时的援助。
